content: I'm really grateful for this detailed to-do list! I think I'll start by brainstorming and gathering ideas for my poetry collection. Speaking of poetry, I've been feeling really inspired lately, and I think it's because I've been writing in my journal every morning. I started it on January 15th, and it's been helping me clarify my thoughts and feelings. Do you have any suggestions on how I can incorporate my journaling practice into my writing routine for these projects?
